title: Editing ticket
body: Can anyone tell me how to make my ticket to private because i may have leaked some information that i dont want to be out there and it was my first ticket so i did not really get what it meant and now i do i would really thank you :)

replies.body: Tickets are private!  Unlike the boards, your ticket is only viewable between yourself and the Riot support team.  It's not possible to edit a ticket, but you can reply to it with any additional info you have.  Hope that helps offer some peace of mind!
